subtitleNullable: Audio features of over 1.2 million songs obtained with the Spotify API
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Inspired by the [160k Spotify Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/yamaerenay/spotify-dataset-19212020-160k-tracks), I decided to make my own.

### Content

The file `tracks_features.csv` contains audio features for over 1.2 million songs, obtained with the Spotify API. Reference for these audio features can be found [here](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api/reference/tracks/get-audio-features/). 

### Acknowledgements

- [Yamaç Eren Ay ](https://www.kaggle.com/yamaerenay) and other creators for the inspiration for this dataset.
- Spotify and the Spotipy team for making an easy to use API.
- MusicBrainz for keeping an extremely complete catalog of music.
title: Spotify 1.2M+ Songs
subtitle: Audio features of over 1.2 million songs obtained with the Spotify API
description:
### Context

Inspired by the [160k Spotify Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/yamaerenay/spotify-dataset-19212020-160k-tracks), I decided to make my own.

### Content

The file `tracks_features.csv` contains audio features for over 1.2 million songs, obtained with the Spotify API. Reference for these audio features can be found [here](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api/reference/tracks/get-audio-features/). 

### Acknowledgements

- [Yamaç Eren Ay ](https://www.kaggle.com/yamaerenay) and other creators for the inspiration for this dataset.
- Spotify and the Spotipy team for making an easy to use API.
- MusicBrainz for keeping an extremely complete catalog of music.
